locations.name: The Ark
locations.description: A spacecraft carrying the last members of the human race and Monoids

locations.name: Refusis 2
locations.description: A planet almost identical to Earth in climatic and other conditions

future_history: Far into the future (the 57th segment of time) the Earth is destroyed by the sun going nova. Mankind and the Monoids undertake a 700-year journey to resettle on Refusis 2. The common cold was cured in the 20th century, but knowledge of the virus was lost in the Primal Wars of the 10th segment. Unsuccessful time travel experiments were undertaken in the 27th segment of time.
additional_notes: The episode introduces the concept of 'segments of time' and 'Galactic Law'. The jungle set, complete with lizards, toucans and an elephant, is noted as impressive.
bottom_line: A clever and tightly constructed tale that could only work in an era that allows a two episode build-up. 'The Ark' is by no means perfect, but at least it tries.
